effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user fights the target up close, inflicting damage without guarding itself. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.
